mean_en: "to divide into different parts or groups; to divide things into different parts or groups;  to move apart; to make people or things move apart; to be between two people
sentence: The couple face to separate directions.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妻面朝不同的方向。
word_etyma: separ分离 + ate形容词后缀具有...的 → separate分离的；个别的
